messages.1000094584:
Whacks enemies in front with the weapon to launch them into the air. The character then jumps and slams down on the enemies.
#yATK {0}%
All damages received increased by {1}%
Duration {2} sec
messages.1000079759:
Maximizes battle abilities by pushing oneself to the limit. While the effect is maintained, #v[Fatigue]#w will be accumulated. When #v[Fatigue]#w reaches its maximum limit, the character will become #y[Lethargic]#w.
#yFor every {0} sec, {1} #v[Fatigue]#y is created (No recovery from Fatigue)
Action Speed and Movement Speed +{2}%
Final Damage +{3}%

#w[Fatigue]
#yMaximum {4}
For every {5} sec, recovers {6}

#w[Lethargy]

messages.1000094585:
Retreats one step to the back and shoots #y[Magic After-image]#w. Enter #y[Normal Attack Button]#w to shoot 2 additional after-images.
#yATK {0}%

#w[Magic After-image]
#yMagical ATK per hit {1}%
Duration {2} sec
Can hit up to {3} times
messages.1000094586: Enter #y[Special Attack Button]#w when hit by an enemy to swing the weapon and push nearby enemies away.\n#yATK {0}%
messages.1000094587: After using the weapon to stab the enemies in front, the character pulls the weapon to pull the stabbed enemies towards oneself.\n#yATK {0}%
messages.1000094588: Charges magic energy at the tip of the spear for a while and shoots the #y[Magic Spear]#w in front. #y[Magic Spear]#w explodes and deals damage to nearby enemies when it comes into contact with enemies. Enemies at the center of the explosion will get a greater damage and get knocked down. Enter #y[Normal Attack Button]#w while charging to launch explosion attack immediately.\n#yATK {0}%\nAdditional damage for central area {1}%
messages.1000094589: During Tumble, enter #y[Normal Attack Button]#w to dash forward and use the weapon to hit the enemies twice.\n#yATK {0}%
messages.1000094590:
Lowers oneself to collect energy in the weapon, then sweeps the floor to make nearby enemies fall. Enter #y[Normal Attack Button]#w while collecting energy to attack immediately. Destruction power and area will depend on the time taken to collect energy.

[Stage 1 Charging]
#yATK {0}%
Attack area {1}m

Attack area {3}m

Attack area {5}m

messages.1000094592: Jumps and summons #y[Magic Spear]#w in the air and throws it onto the ground. #y[Magic Spear]#w deals damage as it remains stuck on the ground, and explodes after #y{0} sec#w and disappears.\n#yATK {1}%\n#yExplosion ATK {2}%
messages.1000094593: Spins and jumps in a high speed to slash enemies as the character advances forward, and hit the ground to create shockwaves that launch enemies into the air.\n#yATK {0}%\nInvincible for {1} sec

messages.1000094594: Quickly dashes to the front to deal damage on enemies. Enter #y[Front Direction Key]#w in the air twice, or enter #y[Shift Key] + [Front Direction Key]#w to use.\n#yLight Attribute\nATK {0}%
messages.1000094595:
Hits the ground with the spear to summon 8 #y[Magic Spear]#w and pushes nearby enemies away. Enter #y[Normal Attack Button]#w to shoot summoned #y[Magic Spear]#w to all sides.
#yATK {0}%

#w[Magic Spear]
#yATK per Spear {1}%
messages.1000094596:
Advances forward and pulls nearby enemies with #y[Turn Slash]#w then takes the #y[Ready Stance]#w. Additional hits can be entered during the #y[Ready Stance]#w. When the #y[Ready Stance]#w is maintained for more than {0} sec, the skill's #y[Cooldown]#w will be reduced by {1} sec.

Additional hit during ready stance
#y[Normal Attack Button]:#w Deals #y[Turn Slash]#w one more time and takes the #y[Ready Stance]#w. Can be entered up to 2 times, and for the last #y[Turn Slash]#w, the skill's #y[Cooldown]#w will be reduced by 3 more seconds.
#yATK {2}%
[Special Attack Button]:#w Energy is focused on the spear and slashes the enemies in front. #y[Turn Slash]#w Damage is increased according to the number of attacks.
#yATK {3}%
Damage per Turn Slash +{4}%
messages.1000094597:
Evades enemies' attacks by climbing on top of the weapon. Enter #y[Normal Attack Button]#w to descend from the weapon and hit the ground to launch enemies into the air. Enter #y[Special Attack Button]#w to jump and evade.
Can be activated with #y[Jump Key]#w during Tumble.
#yCreates {0} #v[Fatigue]#y when used
ATK {1}%
Invincible while on the weapon
messages.1000094598:
After spinning the spear quickly to accumulate magic on the weapon, the character swings the weapon in a big circle to the front to shoot large #y[Magic After-image]#w.

messages.1000098849:
Using the spear, the character jumps high up into the air and descends in a fast speed to create shockwaves on the ground. Enemies attacked by the shockwaves will become #y[Vulnerable]#w for a while.
#yATK {0}%

#w#y[Vulnerable]#w
#yDuration {1} sec#w

Defence power of #y[Vulnerable]#w targets will be reduced by #y{2}%#w.
messages.1000094608:
Spins the spear in a high speed to deal a continuous damage on nearby enemies and accumulate magic energy on the spear. Afterwards, the accumulated energy is released to the front with an explosion, and creates a #y[Magic Wall]#w around oneself that increases Light Attribute ATK.
#yLight Attribute
ATK {0}%

#w[Magic Wall]
#yLight Attribute ATK +{1}%
Only applied the skill user within the area
Duration {2} sec
